inclusion.criterion: criteria for screening for esophageal varices. Patients who had endoscopic variceal therapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous liver transplantation, previous portosystemic shunt procedure, or had a recent history (< 7 days) of upper gastrointestinal bleeding
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: renal insufficiency defined as a serum creatinine of > 1.7 mg/dL in non-diabetics or >1.5 mg/dL in diabetics
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has HCV Cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. Patient also describes new imbalance leading to a fall during which he may have hit his head on.
